name: Naruto
description: Follows Naruto Uzumaki, a young ninja with dreams of becoming the strongest leader, Hokage, while dealing with the challenges of his past.

name: Naruto: Shippuden
description: A continuation of Naruto’s journey as he grows older, faces stronger enemies, and uncovers deeper secrets about his past.

name: Dragon Ball Z
description: The adventures of Goku, a Saiyan warrior, as he defends Earth from powerful foes, ranging from aliens to gods.

name: Attack on Titan
description: Humanity fights for survival behind massive walls to protect themselves from giant humanoid creatures known as Titans.

name: One Piece
description: Follows Monkey D. Luffy and his pirate crew as they search for the ultimate treasure, the “One Piece,” to become the Pirate King.

name: My Hero Academia
description: Set in a world where almost everyone has superpowers, or “Quirks,” it follows Izuku Midoriya’s journey to becoming the world’s greatest hero.

name: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
description: Two brothers, Edward and Alphonse Elric, search for the Philosopher’s Stone to restore their bodies after a failed alchemy experiment.

name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
description: Follows Tanjiro Kamado as he becomes a demon slayer to avenge his family and save his sister, who was turned into a demon.

name: Death Note
description: A psychological thriller where a high school student, Light Yagami, gains the power to kill anyone by writing their name in a supernatural notebook.

name: Sword Art Online
description: Players become trapped in a virtual reality MMORPG, and the only way to escape is by clearing the game—if they die in the game, they die in real life.

name: Bleach
description: Follows Ichigo Kurosaki, a teenager who accidentally acquires the powers of a Soul Reaper and must protect the world from evil spirits.

name: Tokyo Ghoul
description: Set in a world where flesh-eating ghouls exist alongside humans, it follows a college student, Kaneki, who becomes half-ghoul after a tragic encounter.

name: Hunter x Hunter
description: Follows Gon Freecss as he trains to become a Hunter, a special class of adventurers, in hopes of finding his estranged father.

name: JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure
description: A multi-generational saga that follows the Joestar family, each member battling supernatural foes with unique abilities called “Stands.”

name: Neon Genesis Evangelion
description: A psychological mecha series that delves into the minds of teenagers piloting giant robots to protect Earth from mysterious beings called Angels.

name: Fairy Tail
description: Follows the adventures of a guild of wizards, particularly Natsu Dragneel and his friends, as they take on powerful enemies and go on magical quests.

name: Jujutsu Kaisen
description: Follows Yuji Itadori as he joins a secret organization of sorcerers to fight cursed spirits after consuming a powerful cursed object.

name: Cowboy Bebop
description: A space-western following bounty hunters Spike Spiegel and his crew as they chase criminals across the galaxy while confronting their pasts.

name: Steins;Gate
description: A time-travel thriller involving a group of friends who accidentally discover a way to send messages back in time, leading to unforeseen consequences.

name: One Punch Man
description: Saitama, a hero who can defeat any opponent with a single punch, struggles to find a worthy challenger in a world full of superheroes and monsters.

name: The Seven Deadly Sins
description: Follows a disbanded group of knights, each representing one of the Seven Deadly Sins, as they reunite to fight against evil forces in their kingdom.

name: Black Clover
description: Asta, a boy born without magic in a world where everyone has magic, dreams of becoming the Wizard King, the greatest mage in the kingdom.

name: Yu Yu Hakusho
description: A teenager, Yusuke Urameshi, is brought back to life as a Spirit Detective, tasked with investigating supernatural occurrences in the human and spirit worlds.

name: Code Geass
description: Follows exiled prince Lelouch Lamperouge as he gains the power of Geass, allowing him to control others, and uses it to overthrow the tyrannical empire ruling Japan.

name: Re:Zero
description: Subaru Natsuki is transported to a fantasy world, where he discovers he has the ability to return to a specific point in time upon dying.

name: Your Lie in April
description: A heartwarming yet tragic story about a piano prodigy who, after losing his passion for music, finds inspiration through a free-spirited violinist.

name: Haikyu!!
description: A sports anime following a high school volleyball team, particularly Shoyo Hinata, as they aim to become the best in Japan.

name: Sword Art Online
description: Players trapped in a virtual reality MMORPG must fight to survive, knowing that if they die in the game, they die in real life.

name: Inuyasha
description: Follows a modern-day high school girl who is transported to the Sengoku period of Japan, where she teams up with a half-demon to find shards of a sacred jewel.

name: Mob Psycho 100
description: Follows Shigeo “Mob” Kageyama, a young psychic who suppresses his emotions to control his immense powers, while navigating life and fighting spirits.
